Package wtf.choco.alchema.cauldron

Class CauldronUpdateTask

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
wtf.choco.alchema.cauldron.CauldronUpdateTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class CauldronUpdateTask
extends org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
An implementation of BukkitRunnable that handles the updating and ticking of in-world AlchemicalCauldron instances.
Author:
Parker Hawke - Choco
